guide.conclusion: Sarcasm in this project is used on occasion. :-)

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

lines.text: Start with one magazine and see in which direction you can fit in the magazine into the DVD shelf/rack. When you remove both hands the magazine has to stay in the shelf; else try a different orientation.
lines.text_raw: Start with one magazine and see in which direction you can fit in the magazine into the DVD shelf/rack. When you remove both hands the magazine has to stay in the shelf; else try a different orientation.

lines.text: Fill in all the other magazines you proudly own.
lines.text_raw: Fill in all the other magazines you proudly own.

lines.text: Finished! Select a good location to show your collection. The best place is a hackerspace or other place where the public can read, enjoy and share the Make magazines!
lines.text_raw: Finished! Select a good location to show your collection. The best place is a hackerspace or other place where the public can read, enjoy and share the Make magazines!

guide.summary:
As a year-long Make subscriber my collection of all the great Make magazines had to be displayed!

This dirt simple and cheap project gives you a display to present your loved magazines in your living room / hackerspace.
guide.title: Display/Shelf for Make Magazines
